instructions.1: In a large saucepan over medium heat, heat oil and margarine. Stir in 1/2 the onion, and saute until tender. Stir in the rice, and cook until lightly browned.
instructions.2: Pour soy milk and apple juice into the rice. When the rice has absorbed the liquids, gradually pour in vegetable stock, about 1/2 cup at a time, until absorbed. Reserve about 1/4 cup stock. Cover, and cook about 20 minutes, until rice is tender.
instructions.3: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, lightly brown the tofu and remaining onion in the reserved marinated artichoke heart liquid. Stir in the garlic.
instructions.4: Remove the rice from heat, and thoroughly mix remaining vegetable stock, tofu mixture, artichoke hearts, corn, and cayenne pepper into the rice.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the saucepan from Step 1 being used?
Is saucepan from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is rice from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is tofu from Step 3 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is soy milk from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 2?
If we skip Step 3, is it still valid to use the tofu in Step 4?
Can we brown (Step 3) and remove (Step 4) at the same time?
